title: Make gift pack tiles clickable to open detail page

requirements.summary: Add click navigation to GiftPackCard component so that clicking anywhere on the card navigates to a detail page for that gift pack
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking on any part of the GiftPackCard navigates to the detail page
The add-to-cart button remains functional without triggering navigation
Image carousel navigation controls do not trigger page navigation

file_operations.description: Wrap the card content in a clickable container that navigates to the gift pack detail page using useNavigate from @tanstack/react-router. Add stopPropagation handlers to the add-to-cart button and image carousel navigation controls (Previous/Next buttons) to prevent triggering the card click navigation. The entire card should be clickable except for these interactive elements.

requirements.summary: Create a new gift pack detail page route that displays comprehensive information about a single gift pack including all images, full description, pricing details, and add-to-cart functionality
acceptanceCriteria: Detail page is accessible via a route with the gift pack ID as a parameter
Page displays the gift pack's title, full description, price, discount, and category
All images from the gift pack are displayed in a carousel or gallery
Page includes an add-to-cart button that functions correctly
Page shows loading state while fetching gift pack data
Page shows appropriate error state if gift pack is not found

file_operations.description: Create a new detail page component that fetches a single gift pack by ID using the useGiftPacks hook with getGiftPackById. Extract the gift pack ID from route params using useParams. Display the gift pack's title, full description, price with discount calculation, category badge, and all images in a carousel or gallery component. Include an add-to-cart button that uses the useCart hook to add the pack to cart with toast notification. Show a loading skeleton while data is fetching. Display an error message with navigation back to catalog if the gift pack is not found (null result). Use the existing UI components and styling patterns from the codebase (cards, badges, buttons from shadcn/ui).

requirements.summary: Register the new detail page route in the router configuration with the pattern '/gift-pack/:id' where :id is the gift pack identifier
acceptanceCriteria: Route is added to the router configuration in App.tsx
Route correctly extracts the gift pack ID from the URL parameter
Navigation to the route works from the GiftPackCard component

file_operations.description: Import the new GiftPackDetailPage component. Add a new Route definition with path '/gift-pack/$id' that renders the GiftPackDetailPage component. Position this route alongside the other main routes (after CatalogPage and before CheckoutPage for logical grouping). Ensure the route is defined within the routeTree structure using createRoute.
